tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    trait_type VARCHAR(255),
    mutation VARCHAR(255),
    inheritance_pattern VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Students (
  student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name VARCHAR(50),
  birth_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE GeneticData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  trait_name VARCHAR(50),
  trait_value VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
)

CREATE TABLE InheritedTraits (
  trait_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trait_name VARCHAR(50),
  trait_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE genes (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  chromosome VARCHAR(10),
  gene_type VARCHAR(50),
  gene_function VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE traits (
  trait_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trait_name VARCHAR(50),
  trait_description VARCHAR(100),
  dominant_gene VARCHAR(50),
  recessive_gene VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  trait_id INT,
  gene_id INT,
  inherited_trait VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (trait_id) REFERENCES traits(trait_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES genes(gene_id)
);
